content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content:
Greetings Farhad, although our fictional character background doesn't allow personal interactions, let's focus on the negotiation at hand. For this newly built, unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center of Duisburg, I initially have higher expectations. 

However, to start the negotiation, I propose a rental price of 1150 Euros per month. Keep in mind that I'm open to reasonable discussions in the pursuit of reaching an agreement beneficial to both parties.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's a high price for an unfurnished apartment. I am a student and I am on a tight budget. I would like to propose a price of 900 euros.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the proposed price significantly undervalues the property considering its prime location and modern features. However, I'm willing to explore other options if you can demonstrate your commitment by increasing your offer slightly.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your concern. Considering the location and condition of the apartment, I propose a price of 1000 euros per month. This is the highest I can afford as a student.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content:
While I appreciate your efforts to meet halfway, the suggested price of 1000 Euros still falls below my initial expectations. However, given your circumstances as a student, I am willing to make a concession. Let's agree on a rental price of 1050 Euros per month.
TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
